articles.title: OpenAI unveils new AI tool ‘Operator' for independent web tasks
articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Operator,' a new AI tool designed to independently perform web-based tasks. This research preview, currently available to Pro users in the US, uses its own browser to interact with web pages and automate tasks such as filling forms and ordering groceries. OpenAI plans to expand access to other user tiers and integrate Operator into ChatGPT.

articles.title: Ninja Gaiden 4 release date on PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox: Check details
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Team Ninja and PlatinumGames are developing Ninja Gaiden 4, which is set to release in fall 2025 on Xbox Series X and S, PC via Steam, and PlayStation 5. The game will feature a new playable character named Yakumo and will also include Ryu Hayabusa in a significant role. The new game is a day one Xbox Game Pass launch title.

articles.title: If You're Even A Little Bit Into Organizing, You'll Want To Check Out These 28 Products
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article showcases various organizational products available on Amazon, ranging from purse organizers and over-the-toilet storage to laundry sorters and sock organizers. It also features car trash cans, baby clothes dividers, and K-Cup storage drawers. Each product is presented with its benefits, price, and where to purchase.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Gets Seamless Updates After Eight Years
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced seamless updates in its Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra smartphones. This feature minimizes downtime during software installations by applying updates in the background. The seamless update provides a smoother user experience and may lead to faster software deployment and bug fixes.

articles.title: OpenAI's latest tool wants to use your computer for you
articles.author: Bemfica de Oliva
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new product called Operator, designed to perform repetitive online tasks and interact with website interfaces. Operator is intended to automate dull or time-consuming tasks and features advanced reasoning capabilities, requiring user confirmation for actions like purchases. The initial rollout is for US-based ChatGPT Pro subscribers.

articles.title: These two mistakes make people 'scroll past' your listing, Vinted user claims
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: M&S has launched the Jersey Animal Print Midaxi Bodycon Dress, priced at £35.  This new dress, featuring a zebra print and bodycon design, is available in sizes UK 6 to 24 and has received positive reviews for its flattering fit and versatility.

articles.title: Kanye West Debuts New YZY Bodysuit With Warning to Competitors: ‘Be Very Afraid'
articles.author: Lauren Weiler
articles.summary: Kanye West's YZY brand is set to launch YZY Women, a new women's clothing line featuring a bodysuit reminiscent of SKIMS. The launch aims to bring West's vision to life and compete in the shapewear market. The company plans on scaling innovation.

articles.title: Samsung president takes aim at Chinese smartphone companies; says there are 'trust issues'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25 models, featuring a customized Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy chipset. The company plans to launch an ultrathin version, the Galaxy S25 Edge, in the first half of the year. The Galaxy S25 series will be manufactured at Samsung's Noida plant in India.

articles.title: New Samsung Galaxy S25: AI Revolutionizes Smartphone Interaction
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series on February 7th, featuring a new AI-powered approach focused on personalization. This series integrates AI across audio, image processing, and app suggestions to understand user intent and adapt to individual preferences, and its price ranges from €939.90 to €1859.90.

articles.title: Progresso's sold-out Soup Drops are coming back
articles.author: Sarah Bregel
articles.summary: Progresso, owned by General Mills, has launched a new product called Soup Drop, which are soup-flavored hard candies resembling cough drops. These candies, after an initial sell-out, are going back on sale this Thursday and will be available online.

articles.title: Avid Collective calls for alignment on the use of branded content
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Avid Collective advocates for standardized definition for branded content. It launched Avid PubSuite last year, a global end-to-end platform for branded content campaigns. This platform aims to transform branded content campaigns by reducing publishing time and driving revenue growth.

articles.title: Introducing new CX and digital marketing agency, ‘Wonder Works Digital'
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Wonder Works Digital, a new full-service customer experience and digital marketing agency, has launched. Founded by Andrew Ritchie, the agency aims to deliver customer-led experiences through creative, marketing, and digital transformation. Wonder Works Digital offers services including strategy development, digital marketing, creative services, and technology enablement.

articles.title: NIO - version update for luxury
articles.author: IN COLLABORATION WITH NIO
articles.summary: NIO, a technology company that manufactures vehicles, is launching in Israel with its innovative electric vehicles. The company's technology includes battery-swapping stations and advanced driver-assistance systems managed by an AI assistant named NOMI. NIO is also introducing the EL6, a compact SUV with 489 horsepower.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra hands-on: AI-driven features lead the way
articles.author: Quartz Intelligence Newsroom
articles.summary: Samsung is set to release the Galaxy S25 Ultra on Feb. 7, with a starting price of $1,299. The device features advanced AI capabilities, a refined design, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The launch is part of a broader rollout including the S25 and S25+ models, unveiled at the recent Unpacked 2025 event.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Line: Check Pre-Sale Prices Today (23)
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25, a new flagship smartphone series featuring enhanced AI capabilities powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and One UI 7. The Galaxy S25 camera system has been upgraded with a 200MP main sensor and AI-powered features like Scene Optimizer and Object Eraser.  One UI 7 allows users to perform complex actions with single commands using 'AI Select'.

articles.title: OpenAI unveils tool to automate web tasks as AI agents take center-stage
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: OpenAI has previewed Operator, a new AI agent powered by a model that interacts with web elements to carry out tasks for users. Currently available to Pro users in the U.S. as a research preview, Operator can create to-do lists and assist with vacation planning, marking the next step in AI development. Perplexity has also launched a similar agent-based assistant for Android devices.

articles.title: Upgrading to the latest Samsung phone just got easier (and cheaper) - here's why and how to qualify
articles.author: Kayla Solino
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its latest lineup of Samsung Galaxy smartphones, including the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra, at Samsung Unpacked in San Jose, California.  Additionally, Samsung launched the "New Galaxy Club" program for loyal customers who want to upgrade annually.

articles.title: What is Amazon Haul? A look at Amazon's secret section of products $20 or less
articles.summary: Amazon launched "Amazon Haul", a new shopping experience within its mobile app in November, offering products priced $20 and under. This platform provides lower-priced, unbranded options in categories like fashion, home, and electronics to U.S. customers and currently features a 60% off promotion.

articles.title: Last chance to get Marks & Spencer jumper reduced to £20 - 'I have six of these'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer's Cloud Yarn Textured Roll Neck Jumper is popular among shoppers, with one customer buying six. The jumper, available in various sizes and colors, is praised for its softness, washability, and versatility. Next also offers an alternative option.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Gemini New Bixby AI Feature
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Ultra with a revamped Bixby AI assistant. This new Bixby is designed for navigating the phone via natural language, enabling users to control settings and features through voice commands. The goal is to simplify phone usage and address feature bloat by making it easier for users to access and utilize the device's functionalities.

articles.title: Former Standard Chartered Bank MD turns entrepreneur, launches Akashaverse platform providing immersive experience
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Standard Chartered's SC Ventures and KiyaAI have partnered to launch Akashaverse, a new-age startup venture that provides immersive and interactive digital experiences. Akashaverse will focus on virtual pilgrimages, e-commerce, and bespoke events, utilizing VR, AR, and AI technologies. The platform aims to initially focus on India, and will also serve global Indians and multiple markets.

articles.title: OpenAI Releases AI Agent That Helps Book Flights, Order Food for Users
articles.author: Rachel Metz
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching Operator, an AI agent designed to automate tasks like booking flights and online shopping. Currently available as a research preview to ChatGPT Pro subscribers for $200 per month, Operator integrates with services like Instacart and OpenTable. OpenAI intends to expand availability and release additional AI agents, alongside plans to eventually offer the AI model behind Operator for developers.

articles.title: OpenAI's ‘Operator' Agent Can Buy Groceries, File Expense Reports
articles.author: Belle Lin
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched its new AI agent, 'Operator,' for ChatGPT Pro users, enabling the automation of tasks like buying groceries and filing expense reports. Operator can access the internet and interact with webpages, and OpenAI is collaborating with companies like Instacart and Uber to make their services accessible through the agent. The launch marks OpenAI's entry into the AI agent race.

articles.title: Daily Dot Newsletter: Will your Amazon package come with bugs?
articles.author: Andrew Wyrich
articles.summary: Progresso launched new soup-flavored candies. The internet reacted to the new product in a lot of different ways, from excitement, disgust, and intrigue.

articles.title: Nourish dry hands with the best shea-butter hand creams
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The article highlights several shea-butter hand creams. Specifically, L'Occitane Fast-Absorbing 20% Shea Butter Hand Cream, J.R. Watkins Hand Cream With Shea and Cocoa Butters, and Sky Organics Organic Shea Butter are mentioned, detailing ingredients and other things to know about each product.

articles.title: ‘Soup drops' are General Mills' latest strategy to revive waning Progresso
articles.author: Brooks Johnson
articles.summary: General Mills released Progresso's chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candies, also known as 'soup drops,' earlier this month.

articles.title: Samsung's new Galaxy S25 handsets unleash new AI features
articles.author: Niall Kitson
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Galaxy S25 series smartphones (S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25) at the Samsung Unpacked event, featuring enhanced AI capabilities in collaboration with Google's Gemini GenAI model. The new devices include features such as upgraded Circle Search and an 'audio eraser' for simplifying background noise removal in videos.

articles.title: Baldur's Gate III gets ‘curated' mod support on GeForce Now streaming
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Nvidia's GeForce Now streaming service now offers a selection of curated mods, enhancing the PC gaming experience on supported platforms.

articles.title: Miami welcomes FRUGA's new healthy sparkling beverage.
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: FRUGA has launched a new prebiotic fruit soda made with real fruit and all-natural ingredients. The soda is available in Mango, Pineapple, and Pink Guava flavors online through Amazon and drinkfruga.com in 6-packs and 12-packs. FRUGA aims to offer a healthy and delicious sparkling beverage option with low calories and sugar.

articles.title: Samsung driving AI innovation and digital transformation in Tanzania
articles.author: Sauli Giliard
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Galaxy S25 Series in Tanzania, featuring advanced AI capabilities and the Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform. This new phone offers enhanced performance and AI-driven features, including improved camera capabilities and personalized user experiences. The company emphasizes sustainability by incorporating recycled materials in the device.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Launched: A Closer Look
articles.author: Tech City
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, its newest flagship smartphones. The devices are equipped with AITechCity.

articles.title: Huddersfield software firm Adventoris generating 23 per cent of new business through referrals
articles.author: Ben Clarke
articles.summary: Adventoris's partnership program, led by Matthew Pinel, has significantly contributed to new business, with 23% of new business coming from partner referrals in its first year. The company's flagship product, SwiftCloud, a customizable B2B mobile app platform, is now offered as a fully integrated solution by key partners like Tecman, X3 Consulting, Web Control, Unitas and Vision 33. Adventoris aims to focus on ERP vendors, food and drink associations and buying groups in 2025 to promote SwiftCloud.

articles.title: Does the new Honor X9c feel like it was custom-made for Mzansi?
articles.author: Honor South Africa
articles.summary: Global technology brand Honor is launching the HONOR X9c smartphone, the latest addition to its X Series. The Honor X9c features a durable design with drop, heat, and water resistance, a long-lasting 6600 mAh Silicon-carbon battery with 66W fast charging, and a 108MP AI camera. Its design is slim and lightweight.

articles.title: Samsung just teased the Galaxy S25 Edge – here's what we know
articles.author: Alex Lee
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim-line addition to its S-series, at its Galaxy Unpacked event. The S25 Edge features a slender design, a pin-hole front-facing camera, a dual-lens rear camera system, and a near edge-to-edge display and may incorporate a new heat management system. Rumors suggest it will launch in the first half of the year and be cheaper than the S25 Ultra.

articles.title: Comcast Launches Xfinity Sports & News TV Package For $70 Per Month
articles.author: Lucas Manfredi
articles.summary: A new, unnamed offering is launched to compete with YouTube TV and Hulu + Live TV. This suggests a new entrant in the live TV streaming market.

articles.title: Sky Mobile announces pre-order pricing for the hotly-anticipated Samsung S25
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Sky Mobile has announced pre-order deals for Samsung's new S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, starting from £30 per month. Pre-order perks include double storage and a pair of Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro. The S25 Ultra features a new processor, larger display, and AI-powered software, while the S25 and S25+ feature Galaxy AI.

articles.title: Sky Mobile announces pre-order pricing for the hotly-anticipated Samsung S25
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Sky Mobile has announced pre-order deals for the new Samsung Galaxy S25 series (S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra) starting from £30 per month. These deals include unlimited calls and texts with options to add data, along with perks such as double storage and Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro. The S25 Ultra features a new processor and AI-powered software, while the S25 and S25+ include Galaxy AI and ultra-crisp displays.

articles.title: Sky Mobile announces pre-order pricing for the hotly-anticipated Samsung S25
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, with pre-orders available ahead of the official launch on February 7th. Pre-order prices start from £30 a month for the standard S25. Customers taking advantage of pre-order offers will receive double storage at no extra cost, along with a pair of Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro.

articles.title: Sky Mobile announces pre-order pricing for the hotly-anticipated Samsung S25
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Samsung has announced pre-order deals for its new S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, with prices starting from £30 per month. Customers who pre-order will receive double storage and Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro. The S25 and S25+ come in Blue, Navy, Mint, and Silver Shadow, while the S25 Ultra is available in Titanium Blue, Titanium Grey, Titanium Silver, and Titanium Black.

articles.title: Samsung unpacks Galaxy AI's personal data engine
articles.author: Computer Weekly
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled Galaxy AI at its Galaxy Unpacked event, highlighting its aim to enhance user interaction through artificial intelligence. Galaxy AI provides deeper and meaningful connections. It allows real-time language translation, simplifying conversations and improving efficiency.

articles.title: Over 150,000 shoppers are fans of these earbuds, just $21 for a limited time
articles.author: Yahoo Life Shopping Editors
articles.summary: Tozo's T6 Wireless Earbuds are waterproof earbuds with 6mm speaker drivers that produce crystal-clear sound and bass. They offer a 30-hour battery life with the wireless charging case and feature touch controls. Currently, they are available at a nearly 50% discount on Amazon.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series sets the standard of AI phone as a true AI companion
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the launch of the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25 models, featuring enhanced AI capabilities and a customized Snapdragon® 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy chipset. The new series introduces One UI 7 and multimodal AI agents, along with upgraded cameras and a more durable design, with preorders starting from [XXX date].

articles.title: Serta Simmons Bedding Launches Beautyrest® and Beautyrest® World Class™ Collections, Completing Brand Portfolio to Support Sleepers at Every Price Point
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Serta Simmons Bedding (SSB) is launching new Beautyrest and Beautyrest World Class mattress collections starting in February and March 2025. SSB is also launching a new line of adjustable bases called baselogic™, supporting both the Beautyrest and Serta brands, available to retailers starting March 1, 2025. The new mattress collections feature enhanced technology for individualized support, pressure relief, and temperature management.

articles.title: Get Microsoft Office 2024 forever for £28 in deal great for students
articles.author: Kerri Ann Roper
articles.summary: Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2024, the latest version of Microsoft Office, launched in October 2024 and is available for a one-time payment of £28 through Wowcher, offering Word, Excel, Outlook, Teams, Access, and PowerPoint. This contrasts with the subscription-based Office 365 and provides a locked 2024 edition.

articles.title: This Samsung Galaxy S25 deal might be one of the best we've found
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung has announced its new Galaxy S25 phones, featuring a new rounded design, better hardware, and slightly upgraded AI-enhanced camera systems. The new S25 series follows the success of the S24 models.

articles.title: McDonald's SA announces breakfast updates
articles.author: TINTSWALO BALOYI
articles.summary: McDonald's South Africa has introduced a new breakfast offering and affordable value meals, including options like the McSaver menu starting at R10 and Nazo Meals from R29.90. They are also launching new family sharing offers starting at R99.90. Exclusive in-app deals and rewards points are available for customers to save even more.

articles.title: Azercell introduces "AI Chat Bot" for iOS users
articles.summary: Azercell has launched its AI-powered 'AI Chat Bot' service for iOS users. The service provides 24/7 assistance and addresses customer inquiries. Users can access the new feature by updating their Azercell app.

articles.title: Bazzite Now Supports The Lenovo Legion Go S
articles.author: Jason Evangelho
articles.summary: Bazzite, a Linux-based alternative OS, now supports the Lenovo Legion Go S. The latest stable version (41.20250121) of Bazzite includes this support, offering features such as easier dual-booting with Windows and helpers for non-Steam gaming. Bazzite aims to address shortcomings of SteamOS like immutability and lack of secure boot.

articles.title: Pokemon TCG Pocket's next expansion launches on January 30th
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company announced the release date for Space-Time Smackdown, a new batch of Pokémon TCG Pocket cards. However, trading of these cards will not be immediately available.

articles.title: Laundry Tips for Long Trips: Stay Fresh & Clean for Weeks
articles.author: Tay Belgeri
articles.summary: Arm & Hammer offers deodorizer balls for luggage freshness. Uniqlo and Under Armour produce sweat-resistant clothing suitable for both active and cold-weather travel. The Scrubba Wash Bag provides a portable solution for hand-washing clothes while traveling.

articles.title: NovaUCD calls for start-ups to apply for their AI accelerator programme
articles.author: Azmia Riaz
articles.summary: NovaUCD and CeADAR are running the AI Ecosystem Accelerator Programme to support Irish start-ups developing AI-based products or services. The programme targets companies with novel AI products or services and provides support to accelerate their start-ups to investment stage. Companies like Customs Window Technologies and Wrksense, which provide systems for customs declaration management and AI-driven HR tech respectively, previously participated in the program.

articles.title: How Legendairy Milk dominates niche market catering to moms
articles.summary: Legendairy Milk is expanding its product line beyond lactation supplements. In late 2024, the company launched its Women's Health line, addressing stigmatized topics like urinary tract infections and postpartum hair loss. Furthermore, Legendairy Milk is extending its offerings to include baby and kid supplements, building on the trust established with mothers in lactation support.

articles.title: How Saie founder Laney Crowell's network built her clean beauty brand
articles.author: Lydia Moynihan
articles.summary: Saie, a clean beauty brand founded by Laney Crowell, was launched after identifying a gap in the high-end clean beauty market. The brand, known for its strict ingredient policy excluding over 2,000 chemicals, developed products based on customer feedback. In 2019, Saie launched with mascara 101.

articles.title: Does the new HONOR X9c feel like it was custom-made for Mzansi?
articles.author: HONOR
articles.summary: HONOR is launching the new HONOR X9c smartphone, emphasizing its 2-meter drop-resistant Anti-Drop Display, ultra-large 6600 mAh Silicon-carbon Battery, and 108MP camera. The device also features a slim design with titanium finish.

articles.title: Newegg lists NVIDIA RTX 50 Series GPUs and Exclusive ABS Gaming PCs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Newegg Commerce, Inc. announces the availability of the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs. New ABS gaming PCs equipped with the NVIDIA RTX 5090 and RTX 5080 GPUs are also available for purchase on Newegg.

articles.title: MySize Inc. Announces Innovative Integrated Virtual Try-On and Sizing Technology Following Successful Participation at CES and NRF 2025
articles.author: My Size Inc
articles.summary: MySize Inc. launched its Integrated Virtual Try-On Solution, featuring integration with MySize's sizing technology. This new solution is designed to enhance customer experiences, improve operational efficiency, and achieve sustainability goals for fashion brands.

articles.title: Game-Changer in Digital Marketing: Digital Silk Insights into ChatGPT's Integration with Real-Time Search Results
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Digital Silk is integrating ChatGPT with real-time search results to offer businesses enhanced personalization and data-driven decision-making capabilities. This innovative step will allow businesses to respond instantly to customer queries with the latest information and optimize marketing campaigns with AI-generated responses, leading to more meaningful, data-driven engagement.

articles.title: Amazon is selling Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra for the lowest price
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S24 Ultra is currently offered at a reduced price on Amazon, down from £1,349 to £1,199 for a limited time. The S24 Ultra features AI capabilities, an S Pen, enhanced processing power, and a high-megapixel camera with 200x zoom. Customer reviews vary, with some praising the phone's features and battery life, while others express concerns about battery performance.

articles.title: Ye Planning ‘John Wick Vendetta' Against Fashion Companies While Announcing YEEZY Women's Line
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: Ye is preparing to launch 'Yzy women's,' a new product line specifically designed for women under the YZY brand. This indicates an expansion of the company's offerings into a new sector.

articles.title: Leading Startup Square M&Aの包括的支援サービス（M&A Total Exe）を提供開始
articles.summary: Leading Startup Square (LSS) launched a new comprehensive M&A service called 'M&A Total Ex' on January 23, 2025. The service is designed to support startups by providing end-to-end assistance from strategic planning to execution and post-merger integration, ensuring a smooth and efficient M&A process.

articles.title: BYD's Yangwang U9 Jumping Supercar Reaches 100 Deliveries in Just Five Months
articles.author: Shawn Henry
articles.summary: BYD's luxury brand Yangwang launched the Yangwang U9 electric sports car in February 2024, with deliveries starting in September. The U9, priced at $229,700 USD, has delivered 100 units within five months and boasts features like a 960 kW power output, 0-100 km/h acceleration in 2.36 seconds, and a Disus X suspension system.

articles.title: M&S unveils new 'Flower Market' before Valentine's Day with luxury bouquets from £25
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: M&S has launched its new 'Flower Market' experience, designed to redefine their floral offerings. The launch includes updated packaging, a modern aesthetic, and the involvement of a 'Flower Doctor' to ensure freshness. Several new bouquets are also highlighted, including the Blush Rose Abundance Bouquet and Sweetly Scented Rose Tweedia & Freesia Bouquet.

articles.title: Akashaverse: Revolutionizing Digital Experiences
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: SC Ventures, in collaboration with KiyaAI, launched Akashaverse, a new hub for entertainment, social interaction, e-commerce, and lifestyle applications using immersive technology. Akashaverse offers opportunities for virtual pilgrimages and event booking services, enhancing e-commerce experiences. KiyaAI's Bharatmeta platform powers Akashaverse, aiming to transform digital engagement.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series debuts new AI features, including improved Circle to Search: What they do
articles.author: Shaurya Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series featuring new Galaxy AI functionalities such as Writing Assist, enhanced Circle to Search that recognizes various data types, Call Transcripts for real-time transcriptions, and Drawing Assist for detailed illustrations. The series also introduces Audio Laser, a tool similar to Google's Pixel Audio Eraser, and incorporates an on-device personal data engine for privacy-focused processing.

articles.title: Electrifying Partnership: Lincoln and Tianneng Batteries Powering the Future
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: By 2025, over 5,000 Lincoln sedans will feature Tianneng automotive batteries, utilizing the PowerDurable3.0 technology. This technology includes nano-carbon innovation, integrated three-proof technology, and rapid-current grid technology, enhancing battery stability and performance for Lincoln's electronic systems. Tianneng's service network will also provide installation and after-sales support for Lincoln vehicles.

articles.title: Nationwide to pay new customers £175 - how to get it
articles.author: Richard Guttridge
articles.summary: Nationwide is offering £175 to new customers who switch their bank account, as part of a strategy to attract clients. First Direct also gives new customers £175. Santander Edge account gives a free £150 for bills account.

articles.title: Sky Mobile confirms Samsung Galaxy S25 stock and prices with huge deal up for grabs
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Galaxy S25 smartphone series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, available for pre-order with Sky Mobile offering contracts starting from £30 per month and including free Galaxy Buds3 Pro and double storage. The S25 series features improved AI capabilities and will be available through Samsung, Currys, and Very.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy S25 with AI features powered by Google
articles.author: Technext
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled its newest Galaxy product. The unveiling occurred at the company's Unpacked presentation in San Jose, California, yesterday.

articles.title: 'Absolute game-changing' Philips gadget that keeps winter jackets and coats pristine
articles.author: Taite Johnson
articles.summary: Philips offers the 1000 Series Fabric Shaver, priced at £24.99 on Amazon, designed to remove lint and bobbles from clothing. It is USB-chargeable, operates for 90 minutes, and features an easily removable waste container. Alternative fabric shavers are also available, such as the JML Bobble Off and the Lakeland Rechargable Lint Remover.

articles.title: 10 Reasons to Switch to CapCut Commerce Pro for Ad Creation
articles.author: Jimmy
articles.summary: CapCut Commerce Pro, an AI-powered tool, simplifies ad creation with an intuitive interface and automated features like trimming, transitions, and audio syncing. It offers pre-made templates, customizable branding options, and high-quality video output optimized for various platforms, enabling efficient and effective ad creation for businesses of all sizes.

articles.title: Personal care challenger Wild unveils refillable handwash in four fragrances
articles.author: Daniel Selwood
articles.summary: Wild has launched a new refillable natural handwash, available in an aluminum bottle with compostable refills. The handwash is offered in four fragrances: Fresh Cotton & Sea Salt, Honey & Almond, Citrus Burst, and Spa Daydreams. The company aims to reduce single-use plastic from bathrooms with natural, refillable alternatives.

articles.title: Nourish dry hands with the best shea-butter hand creams
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The article recommends L'Occitane Fast-Absorbing 20% Shea Butter Hand Cream as a high-quality option with various scent choices. It also features J.R. Watkins Hand Cream With Shea and Cocoa Butters, a budget-friendly, cruelty-free option, and Sky Organics Organic Shea Butter, a 100% organic shea butter product that can be used on both hands and face.

articles.title: Schneider Electric Launches an Integrated Marketing Campaign for its Miluz ZeTa Range of Switches and Sockets
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: Schneider Electric launched the Miluz Zeta Range of Switches and Sockets, designed and manufactured in India. The range features an industry-first integrated Air Quality Indicator (AQI) monitor. The launch includes digital storytelling, on-ground activations, retailer outreach, and a brand film.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 - all new AI features revealed after launch and when you can get one
articles.author: Rachel Cronin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its Galaxy S25 series, featuring three new phones: S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra. Available for pre-order and officially released on February 7, the series includes new Galaxy AI features such as Cross App Action, Now Brief & Now Bar, Circle to Search with Google, Audio Eraser & Auto Trim, ProScaler & Next Gen ProVisual Engine, and improved camera capabilities like Nightography and real-time image processing.

articles.title: This Travel Company Says Google's AI Search Results Are Already Hurting Its Business
articles.author: Richard Nieva
articles.summary: Google launched AI Overviews, a new AI-generated search result feature. Companies like Kayak are concerned that this feature discourages users from visiting their websites, as AI Overviews provide answers directly on Google's homepage.  In response, Kayak is increasing its bidding on sponsored links and exploring alternative marketing strategies such as social media campaigns.

articles.title: 'Quiet' dehumidifier that 'dries clothes overnight' £99 off
articles.author: Léonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Hangsun's 12L Dehumidifier is now available for £119.98, reduced from £218.98. ANSIO offers Wardrobe Dehumidifier Hanging Bags for £12.97. Dunelm sells a 12L Electric Dehumidifier for £120, and George offers the Daewoo Dehumidifier 12L for £79, reduced from £105. These products are noted for their ability to reduce moisture and improve air quality.

articles.title: I demoed Samsung's new Galaxy AI features - these 3 made my iPhone look bad
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing new Galaxy AI features that are perceived to be superior to those offered by Apple. The upcoming Galaxy S25 series is also mentioned, suggesting further advancements in Samsung's product line.

articles.title: Best Samsung Galaxy S25 deals: $200 gift cards and free offers at T-Mobile and Verizon
articles.author: Allison Murray
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, featuring a Snapdragon Elite 8 chipset and enhanced Galaxy AI integration. Preorders have begun, with the official sale date set for February 7. The base model S25 starts at $799 and boasts a 6.2-inch FHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, various storage options, and exclusive color options available on Samsung's website.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge was sneakily the best announcement at Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Samsung teased the upcoming Galaxy S25 Edge at their Unpacked event. This new model is designed to be super thin, featuring only two cameras, unlike the rest of the Galaxy S25 lineup. It is expected to launch in the first half of the year with a price below the S25 Ultra's $1,299.

articles.title: Shyft Redefines Clean Nutrition with the Launch of Its ‘5 Ingredients Only' Plant Protein Isolate
articles.author: Od Admin
articles.summary: Shyft has launched its Plant Protein Isolate, a plant-based protein powder featuring only five ingredients and free of refined sugars and artificial additives. The Plant Protein Isolate is available on Shyft's website and Amazon for INR 1800. Each scoop delivers between 24.4g and 26g of high-quality protein.

articles.title: I can't find 5 new things about the Samsung Galaxy S25 - the S24 is a better deal
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25, featuring 12GB RAM in every storage option, an upgrade from the Galaxy S24. The Galaxy S25 runs One UI 7 based on Android 15.

articles.title: Transformational Journey of GDM: A 15-year odyssey
articles.author: Olatunbosun Michael
articles.summary: GDM Group, a marketing and media technology company, is expanding its offerings to include project consulting services in marketing, technology, and management. This strategic move aims to provide businesses with expert guidance in navigating complex challenges, implementing cutting-edge technologies, and optimizing operational performance.

articles.title: Sony to Open New Commercial Complex in Ginza Sun.
articles.summary: Sony Group Corp. is launching Ginza Sony Park, a new commercial complex in Tokyo's Ginza district. The facility, replacing the Sony Building, will host art, music, and other events, showcasing Sony's businesses like music and semiconductors. Initially, an experience-based art event will be held.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Unpacked: People Are Unimpressed
articles.author: Callum Booth
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Galaxy S25 range, including the S25, S25 Plus, S25 Ultra, and S25 Edge, at its Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose, California. The internet's reaction was lukewarm due to perceived minimal enhancements compared to earlier models and the plateauing of smartphone technology, leaving potential buyers feeling like they aren't getting enough new features for their money.

articles.title: 30 Things That'll Help You Get Ready In Basically Half The Time
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article recommends several beauty and personal care products available on Amazon and Etsy. These include the Revlon one-step hair dryer and volumizer, priced at $33.58+, and Mane Club One Hit Wonder 10-in-1 spray, available for $9.95. Additionally, the article highlights Glossier's perfecting skin tint, available at Sephora for $28.

articles.title: Burq Launches Last-Mile Delivery Innovations to Transform Grocery, Retail, and Beyond in 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Burq has launched enhanced AI-driven analytics, automated delivery workflows, a nationwide provider network, and a brand delivery experience as new features. The company also introduced a refreshed brand identity to serve its diverse customer base better. These updates aim to redefine last-mile delivery solutions and provide tailored services across industries.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series launched: Price, pre-order deals, full specifications and more
articles.author: Moksh Dhand
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The S25 Edge is part of the Galaxy S25 series and boasts a slim profile, an expected Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and integration with Google's Gemini AI for personalized user experiences. While pricing is not yet official, it is expected to be priced below the standard S25 model.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy S25 edge to challenge Apple's Iphone 17 air
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-slim smartphone with a near edge-to-edge screen, during its Galaxy Unpacked event. It features dual rear cameras and a pinhole front camera. The Galaxy S25 Edge is expected to debut in the first half of 2025 with a price lower than the S25 Ultra.

articles.title: Samsung S25 launch offers: Free Galaxy Buds3 and double storage deals unveiled
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new S25 smartphone range, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, and is offering double storage for free as a pre-order incentive. Customers can also receive a free pair of Galaxy Buds 3 using the code 'S25LIVE'. Sky Mobile has unveiled its alternative contract deals for the S25 series.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers 'go crazy' for new Lush-looking shower gel that's just £2
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a new shower gel, 'Winter Queen', priced at £1.99, which is candyfloss-scented with notes of strawberry, raspberry, and vanilla. Shoppers are comparing it to Lush's popular 'Snow Fairy' line, praising its similar scent and significantly lower price point.

articles.title: NIVEA's Derma Skin Clear Solution Launches With Flash Mob, Games & More At Sunway Pyramid
articles.author: Khirthnadhevi Kumar
articles.summary: NIVEA launched a new skincare formula featuring salicylic acid, niacinamide, and sea salt, promising clearer and healthier skin in seven days. To celebrate the launch, NIVEA hosted an event at Sunway Pyramid, offering shoppers activities, exclusive deals, and special appearances.

articles.title: Is the Samsung Galaxy S25 waterproof?
articles.author: Bryan M. Wolfe
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, featuring the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Plus, and Galaxy S25 Ultra. The phones are equipped with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, enhanced vapor chamber cooling, Qi2 wireless charging, and operate on the One UI 7 software with AI-powered personalization features.

articles.title: Samsung is bringing a popular phone back from the dead
articles.author: Fionna Agomuoh
articles.summary: Samsung announced its Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event. The company also teased the upcoming Galaxy S25 Edge, hinting at a potential new device with deconstructed smartphone parts shown on demo screens.

articles.title: Samsung aims to turn its next generation of Galaxy smartphones into AI companions
articles.author: Metla Sudha Sekhar
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled its Galaxy S25 models, emphasizing AI integration. The new phones feature a faster chip, a more powerful ultrawide lens, and an 'AI companion' to learn routines and perform tasks. The Galaxy S25 series is set to launch starting Feb. 7, with prices starting at $800.

articles.title: Review: A bargain robot vacuum cleaner that has all the latest tech
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Ultenic has launched the T10 Lite robot vacuum, a lighter and sleeker version of the original T10. The T10 Lite retains the power and LiDAR sensor of its predecessor while offering a more affordable price point, currently available on Amazon for £220.99. It features a self-emptying base station, long battery life, and an improved app for easy mapping and scheduling.

articles.title: Review: A bargain robot vacuum cleaner that has all the latest tech
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Ultenic has released the T10 Lite robot vacuum, a slimmer and sleeker version of the original T10, retaining its 5,000pa suction power and LiDAR sensor. It boasts up to 180 minutes of battery life and a 3-liter waste capacity. The Ultenic T10 Lite is currently available on Amazon for £220.99 as a limited-time deal.

articles.title: I taste-tested supermarket tomato soup - 62p tin beats Heinz
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Tesco, Asda, and Sainsbury's offer Cream of Tomato Soup, with Tesco and Sainsbury's soups being sweet with a smooth consistency. Lidl's Newgate Cream of Tomato Soup is highlighted as a preferred, cost-effective alternative to Heinz, matching its tangy taste and creamy consistency.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS: Petrol power returns, but prices up
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: MG is launching new, more affordable petrol-powered MG ZS models, starting at $26,990 drive-away, replacing the previous ZS and ZST models. These new models, including Excite and Essence trims, offer updated features and engine options, with the Essence trim optionally available with a turbocharged 1.5-litre engine. All models are backed by MG's 10-year/250,000km warranty.

articles.title: Lipsticks: The Ultimate Beauty Essential for Every Look
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: M.A.C introduced Powder Kiss Lipstick with a soft-focus matte finish and moisturizing formula. Bobbi Brown launched Crushed Lip Color, a versatile lipstick with buildable pigmentation and a soft, matte finish. ANASTASIA BEVERLY HILLS presented Satin Lipstick, a creamy lipstick with a smooth, satin finish. Huda Beauty released Power Bullet Matte Lipstick with a bold matte finish.

articles.title: LGU+, ‘익시오' 앱 선탑재 갤럭시 S25 시리즈 사전예약 프로모션
articles.author: 정민우 기자
articles.summary: LG Uplus is launching pre-orders for the Samsung Galaxy S25 series, which comes pre-installed with the 'Ixio' AI-based call agent service. The launch includes promotions like the 'Phone Replacement Pass with New Galaxy AI Club' and online events with demonstrations of the phone's AI features, specifically focusing on new features of Ixio, such as AI search that suggests YouTube shorts related to the call content.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy S25 with AI Innovations
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Galaxy S25 series, which includes the S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25 models, targeting the super-premium smartphone market. The series, manufactured in India, features advanced AI capabilities and a next-generation camera system, with prices ranging from Rs 80,999 to Rs 1.65 lakh.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Launched
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Ultra, the flagship model, features a subtle curvature in its rectangular design, differing slightly from the Galaxy S24 Ultra. The device is IP68 certified for water and dust resistance, indicating a refinement in product design.

articles.title: How Givaudan is crafting unique sensory experiences for regional consumers
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Givaudan launched its Innovation Hub in Dubai, featuring technologies like the Virtual Aroma Synthesizer (VAS) and ATOM, to expedite flavor creation and product development. The hub also houses a Consumer and Sensory Insights (CSI) center and a co-creation suite to tailor food and beverage products to the South Asia, Middle East, and Africa (SAMEA) region, aiming to reduce time-to-market and create consumer-centric innovations.

articles.title: Samsung teases its first tri-fold smartphone: Check features, launch timeline
articles.summary: Samsung has officially teased its first-ever tri-fold smartphone, aiming to compete with Huawei's Mate XT. The device, speculated to feature a 9.9 to 10-inch display when fully unfolded and a "G-type" form factor, may have a limited production run of 200,000 units and is expected to launch alongside the next-gen Galaxy Z Fold and Z Flip smartphones later this year.

articles.title: Samsung launches S25 smartphone with boosted AI as Apple battle heats up
articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models, with boosted AI features and a custom chip. Preorders began on Wednesday, with the devices going on sale on Feb. 7. The series features additional AI applications and prices start at $799 for the Galaxy S25.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS: Petrol power returns, but prices up
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: MG is launching more affordable, exclusively petrol-powered models of its new-generation ZS, following the late last year release of the hybrid power version.

articles.title: Azercell introduces "AI Chat Bot" for iOS users
articles.summary: Azercell has launched its AI-powered "AI Chat Bot" service for iOS users, offering 24/7 customer assistance. This follows the December 2024 launch of the same bot for Android users, making Azercell the first local telecom company to introduce an AI-powered bot solution. The latest app update also allows users to submit feedback.

articles.title: The Best Lip Oils for Hydration, Shine, and Color: Top Picks for Soft, Plump Lips
articles.summary: Makeup Revolution London introduces the Pro Glossy Plump Lip Oil, designed to provide a glossy, plump look without a sticky feel. It offers a natural flush of color, hydration, and lightweight wear, making it suitable for those seeking a dewy and fresh look. Formulated for dry lips, it includes nourishing ingredients for moisture restoration and a soft, smooth finish.

articles.title: Buy these Top Libalm for Ultimate Hydration
articles.summary: Nivea offers a hydrating lip balm. Recode Studios introduces Recode Lip Plumper for hydration and fullness. Natural Himalaya Soft Vanilla Lip Care provides concentrated moisturization. The Ayurveda Co. lip balm utilizes plant-based ingredients and beetroot pigment. Elittystore Winter Transparent Lip Balm offers hydration and a glossy finish for winter use.

articles.title: Samsung aims to turn its next generation of Galaxy smartphones into AI companions
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its new line of Galaxy S25 phones at a media event in San Jose on January 21, 2025. The phones feature advanced camera and artificial intelligence capabilities.

articles.title: Everything announced at Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 series at its Unpacked 2025 event. The new phones feature enhanced AI integration tailored to be context-sensitive and predictive. This intelligent enhancement maximizes user experience.

articles.title: Next launch stylish new 'boxy' denim jacket for £55 and leopard print fans will love it
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: Next has released a leopard print boxy denim jacket. The jacket features a boxy shape and is suggested to be paired with various items like black skirts, boots, dresses, or wide-legged trousers.

articles.title: Samsung Teased a New Device at the Very End of Its Unpacked Event
articles.author: Leanne Butkovic
articles.summary: Samsung showcased its S25 series phone line and updates to Galaxy AI at its January Unpacked event. The presentation also included a brief look at a new Galaxy Edge device, featuring a whirlwind gallery of the phone's components.

articles.title: Samsung teased a very slim phone called the Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung teased the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thinner version of its Galaxy S25, at its Unpacked event. This device will incorporate innovative technology and be available in the US and other markets by mid-year. While Samsung hasn't finalized the price, it is expected to be cheaper than the Ultra model.

articles.title: Samsung unveils AI-powered Galaxy S25 smartphones running only Qualcomm chips
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced its Galaxy S25 smartphones, featuring Qualcomm chips and Google's AI. A thinner model, the Galaxy S25 Edge, is slated for release in the first half of the year. The Galaxy S25 series will retain its original price between US$799 and US$1,299.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 series has arrived, is available now for pre-order
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled its Galaxy S25 lineup. Information on the price and availability of the new handsets is provided.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra has arrived, but there aren't many changes
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung revealed the Galaxy S25 Ultra. The new model has few differences compared to the previous S24 Ultra.

articles.title: Nearly 10 years later, Tumblr TV launches to all as a TikTok alternative
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: In 2015, Tumblr initially launched Tumblr TV as an experimental GIF discovery feature. Now, Tumblr has decided to launch Tumblr TV, which has evolved to support video, to all its users due to uncertainty around TikTok.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new AI phones in bid to beat Apple, Chinese rivals
articles.summary: Samsung launched its new Galaxy S25 smartphones featuring AI capabilities, powered by chips from Qualcomm and Google's Gemini AI system. The phones include features like the 'Now Brief' service, providing personalized recommendations. The starting price remains unchanged at $799.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Phones Once Again Lean Heavily on AI
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its new Galaxy S25 series of flagship smartphones at Galaxy Unpacked in San Jose. The Galaxy S25 series is equipped with AI capabilities and LLMs.

articles.title: NSK Grocer lands in The Rivercity
articles.summary: NSK Grocer has launched its seventh outlet at The Rivercity in Kuala Lumpur. The new outlet offers a wide range of groceries, household essentials, and fresh produce at reasonable prices, aiming to elevate convenience for shoppers at The Rivercity.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Boasts Advanced AI Operating System
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its Galaxy S25 series, which features a new AI-based OS called One UI 7. The series includes enhanced camera systems with ProScaler technology, a 50MP ultrawide camera, and AI-powered editing tools. The Galaxy S25 series will be available for pre-order in Indonesia starting January 23, 2025.

articles.title: I went hands-on with Samsung's standard Galaxy S25 and didn't envy the Ultra model at all
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, featuring new contextual AI features and refined hardware designs. The Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus models have slimmer and thinner designs, improved in-hand feel, and dynamic refresh rate displays, with the S25 having a 6.2-inch AMOLED display and the S25 Plus a 6.7-inch screen.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra hands-on: 3 reasons I recommend the flagship phone (and 1 reason to skip)
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, priced at $1,299, featuring a more durable display, an upgraded camera system, the S Pen stylus, and enhanced AI capabilities. The S25 Ultra is lighter and thinner than previous models and includes Corning Gorilla Armor 2 for increased durability.

articles.title: EV brand walks back electric-only plans, confirms PHEV
articles.author: Marton Pettendy
articles.summary: Smart #5 will offer a plug-in hybrid powertrain option, deviating from the trend of only offering electric vehicles. This makes the Chinese-German carmaker the latest Geely brand to move away from purely electric vehicle offerings.

articles.title: Porsche Taycan now electric, makes it to India. Here's all you need to know about it!
articles.summary: Porsche has launched the all-electric Taycan in India, starting at ₹ 1.89 crore. The four-door sports coupe offers a range of up to 652 km and features three screens inside, with an optional fourth passenger entertainment screen. It comes in two variants: the Taycan 4S (510 bhp) and the Turbo (697 bhp).

articles.title: Alibaba Cloud updates AI tools and infrastructure for developers
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Alibaba Cloud has launched new products and services, including the Qwen2.5 series large language models, Tongyi Lingma coding assistant, Workflow, Agent, and RAG development tools. Additionally, they are launching 9th Generation Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances in April and Alibaba Cloud Container Compute Service (ACS) in January 2025, providing enhanced computing and container-based workload deployment capabilities.

articles.title: These 36 Cleaning Products May Be Boring, But Yowza, Do Reviewers Love Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article features a variety of newly available cleaning products. These include the Pink Stuff "Sqeezy" sponge set for tough cleaning, Sprayway Glass Cleaner for streak-free surfaces, Simple Shine jewelry cleaning kit, Bissell multipurpose carpet cleaner for removing stains, and Dawn Powerwash Spray for easy dishwashing.

articles.title: Council Post: The Great Consolidation: How Mergers Are Reshaping The Software Industry
articles.summary: The software industry is experiencing consolidation, where companies are merging or acquiring others to create comprehensive platforms. For example, Microsoft acquired LinkedIn to add networking to its productivity tools. Similarly, Adobe's acquisition of Figma led to richer design tools. Shopify provides an all-in-one e-commerce platform, consolidating various services for online stores.

articles.title: Fun, fresh and fruity: Why this sweet spot upends stereotypes about frozen yoghurt
articles.author: Sydney Morning Herald
articles.summary: Yo-Chi launched a new flagship store in Barangaroo. The new store emphasizes customer choice and variety.

articles.title: Target's colorful new Stanley Tumblers and Quenchers are already selling out
articles.author: Town Talk
articles.summary: Stanley has introduced a new product, potentially a hydration-related item, that is being promoted for purchase, especially during Valentine's Day and winter seasons.

articles.title: Samsung unveils AI smartphones with Qualcomm chips
articles.author: The Daily Herald
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled its newest Galaxy S25 smartphones, which are powered by Qualcomm's chips and Google's AI model. The new phones feature upgraded AI capabilities. Samsung also previewed a thinner version of its flagship phone.

articles.title: What to know about President Donald Trump\u2019s order targeting the rights of transgender people
articles.author: The Scranton Times-Tribune
articles.summary: TechSolutions Inc. launched AssistPro, an AI-powered customer service platform. AssistPro utilizes NLP and machine learning to provide personalized support and integrates with existing CRM systems. Early adopters reported a 30% reduction in customer service costs.

articles.title: First pre-orders for Nintendo Switch 2 accessories are here
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Nintendo unveiled the Nintendo Switch 2 last week with a hardware-focused trailer. Some companies are already selling accessories designed for the new console. Details about the release date and price are still unconfirmed.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series photos and features leak online — stoking anticipation for unveiling
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced its Galaxy S25 series of smartphones, unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose. This new product line from the South Korean tech giant is expected to rival Apple's iPhone.

articles.title: Grand Opening of Tommy's Express: Revolutionizing Car Wash Services in Colorado Springs
articles.author: SPONSORED FEATURE
articles.summary: Tommy's Express is launching its first Flex model express car wash in Colorado Springs, featuring two conveyorized tunnels for interior express cleaning. The grand opening event on January 24th and 25th includes free exterior washes, discounted interior cleaning, and a partnership with Sue's Gift, where a portion of Saturday's proceeds will be donated. This new location aims to provide fast, efficient, and high-quality car wash services.

articles.title: Come Home to Classic Comfort Food Specials at Chompie's FEB. 6-APRIL 30
articles.summary: Chompie's announced the launch of its new Classic Comforts Meatloaf menu. This constitutes a new product launch by the company.

articles.title: Sweet smell of success for Sabah's Sharifah
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: Sharifah Kursiah Sharif Abd Majid launched SK Perfume in 2018. The perfume's creation was inspired by her experience managing hotels. Currently, SK Perfume is manufactured at her facility in Sungai Buloh, Peninsular Malaysia.
